page.title: 07HOUSING IN HOLBERROW GREEN
page.content:
Most of the houses, with the exception of some farmhouses, were built circa 1950. Over the years these have had considerable improvements made to them adding extensions, installing central heating and making alterations to both the interior and exterior.
There appears to be a house for those farms which are still working for the farmer and his family, but a proportion of those on non-working farms are now used as private residences. Some farms are worked by tenants who occupy the house but most are owned.
Home ownership in the majority with a very small number of council properties providing accommodation.
